lines.text: Ah, what do you say, Munroe, hmm? What are the odds?
About the same as spitting in an Air Commodore's eye from an express train, sir.
[During a low level flight to a target in France, Munroe's Navigator leans over to him]
I hope you brought your driving licence with you.
What for?
You fly this thing any lower, you're going to need it!

[Pointing to the V-1 launchers]
Look at those bastards! Three V-1's ready to take off!
Enough to flatten another square mile of London!
We're not stopping enough of them, are we sir?
No, we're just thinning them out a little.
You were close, weren't you?

[Walking off]
We were brought up together.

[Walking alongside]
Really? Were there family connections?
No. My mother and father were killed some time ago. I've always thought of Sqaudron Leader Scott's parents as my own
I see.
Well, I suppose i'd better go and tell them.
Hateful business. I could never find the words.

[Watching Beth walkaway in tears]
What did you say to my sister?
I didn't have to say anything.

[Face falls]
Scotty?
[Quint nods]
When do you return to duty?
Duty? What duty?
[Indicates his missing arm]
flying a desk one handed!
If that's all you think you can handle.
Well, they've offered me a hook - makes a marvelous back scratcher, so I'm told!
Well, I'm sure Scotty would settle for it right now
[Leaves]

[Watching Quint come back from talking to Beth]
Do you thing I should go to her?
No, I don't think you should go to her! Just let her cry!
When your parents died, and you came to live with us, Mother and I always admired your spirit, the way you handled your grief, and went on with your life.
Well, that's what they would have wanted me to do.
I... I only hope we can do as well, Quint.

[On the recon mission to Charlon]
How close do you want to go?
Part their hair, Squadron leader!

[Indicating the German flak gunners]
Noisy lot, wern't they
Lat's a lot of flak for one chateau! they must have something they don't want seen.
It's a good reason for us to have to go in again!

[Kemble has asked for a second run over the chateau]
How close do you want to go this time?
Knock their bloody heads off!

[Watching the fire crews remove Kemble from the wrecked Mosquito]
Well, lets hope those bloody pictures are worth it!

[Watching the German film of RAF prisoners being delivered to Charlon]
That's Scotty!
[Douglas insists that Quint tell Beth that Scotty is still alive]
You want me to tell her he's in Charlon? My next mission is to bomb Charlon!
